parameters.jsCode: const rows = $input.all().flatMap(i => Array.isArray(i.json) ? i.json : [i.json]); if (rows.length === 0) { return [{ json: { lastSyncIso: '1970-01-01T00:00:00Z' } }]; } const row = rows[0]; const last = row.last_sync_at || '1970-01-01T00:00:00Z'; const iso = new Date(last).toISOString(); return [{ json: { lastSyncIso: iso } }];

const input = $input.all(); if (input.length === 0) return []; const data = input[0].json; const tareas = data.value || []; const items = []; for (const t of tareas) { const job_no = t.projectNo || t.jobNo || t.job_no || ''; const no = t.no || ''; const description = (t.description && String(t.description).trim()) ? String(t.description).trim() : 'Sin descripci√≥n'; if (!job_no || !no) continue; items.push({ json: { job_no, no, description, company_name: 'Power Solution Iberia SL' }, pairedItem: { item: 0 } }); } return items;
